Timestamp Microservice.description: API takes human readable timestamp or unix(epoch) timstamp and returns both formats.
Timestamp Microservice.usage: Pass a unix timestamp or natural language data to the api (example: June 1, 1983)

Request Header Parser Microservice.description: API returns IP address, language and software that was received in headers.
Request Header Parser Microservice.usage: This API takes no queries or parameters

URL Shortener Microservice.description: API creates shortened urls that will redirect to the desired original link
URL Shortener Microservice.usage: Pass a URL as a parameter or a short code.

Image Search Abstraction Layer.description: API searches imgur for specified search string.
Image Search Abstraction Layer.usage: Pass search string parameter with optional offset query. Offset specifies page of results.
